mapper.select: select t.dwmc,t.dwdm,t.lxr,t.lxr_dh,t.bz, sfqy,decode(sfqy,'1','启用','未启用') sfqymc, to_char(createtime,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from app_dept t where isdel='0' order by createtime desc

select r.userid, r.username, r.loginname, r.pwd, r.upwd, r.gddh, r.yddh, r.dw, r.sfqy, decode(sfqy, '1', '启用', '未启用') sfqymc, r.fpz, r.email, r.bzxx, (select b.id from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.code like '%00' and length(b.code)=6 and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id ) admin, (select b.parent_name from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.code like '%00' and length(b.code)=6 and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id ) adminmc, to_char(createtime, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from app_user r where isdel = '0' and r.userid!='1' order by createtime desc

select r.userid,r.username,r.loginname,r.pwd,r.upwd,r.gddh,r.yddh,r.dw,r.sfqy, decode(sfqy,'1','启用','未启用') sfqymc,r.fpz,r.email,r.bzxx, to_char(createtime,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime, nvl((select 1 from sys_userrole where userid=r.userid and roleid=#{id}),2) status from app_user r where isdel='0' order by createtime desc
